com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout
Class RowData

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.RowData

public class RowData
extends java.lang.Object

Layout data for RowLayout that controls the width and height of a widget.

See Also:
RowLayout

          Constant for filling in both directions.

Field Detail

FILL_BOTH

public static final int FILL_BOTH
Constant for filling in both directions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FILL_HORIZONTAL

public static final int FILL_HORIZONTAL
Constant for filling horizontally.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FILL_VERTICAL

public static final int FILL_VERTICAL
Constant for filling vertically.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

height

public float height
Specifies the preferred height in pixels (default value is DEFAULT). The default value indicates that the layout should use the widget's computed height.

width

public float width
Specifies the preferred height in pixels (default value is DEFAULT). The default value indicates that the layout should use the widget's computed width.

fillWidth

public boolean fillWidth
Specifies if the widget's width should fill it's region. When true, the width field is ignored (default value is false).

fillHeight

public boolean fillHeight
Specifies if the widget's height should fill it's region. When true, the height field is ignored (default value is false.

Constructor Detail

RowData

public RowData()
Creates a new row data.

RowData

public RowData(float height,
               float width)
Creates a new row data.

Parameters:
height - the height in pixels
width - the width in pixels

RowData

public RowData(int type)
Creates a new row data with the given type.

Possible values are:

  • FILL_BOTH
  • FILL_HORIZONTALLY
  • FILL_VERTICALLY

Parameters:
type - the type
